title: I HAVE PROBLEM HERE HELP
body:
when I download is 45% I wait a while, suddenly re-hit from 0% again and repeated like until 3x I'm tired, what does it work like that or my computer error ?.
My com,puter 730GTX
Prossecor:     I3
Ram          :     16GB
Windows7 64bit                       HELP                   ME                                      HELPME

replies.body: Hmmmm that can sometimes happen if your network has a hiccup in its connection. Try getting the update/install going with a hardwired ethernet connection and let me know if that works a bit better.
